title: Decriminalize Sex Work in the United States
name: Decriminalize Sex Work

sponsor.name: Cyan Banister
sponsor.thanksText: Thanks to @cyantist for sponsoring the Decriminalize Sex Work in United States

paragraphs: This Decriminalizing Sex Work policy calls for the United States to not to criminally penalize any person--adult or minor--for selling his or her own sexual services. Additionally, the U.S. should not criminally penalize those who purchase sexual services from adults.
